column1: I wish quick recovery for talented @TOLOnews Journalists. I am sure they will win the coronavirus and will be back to serve to Afghanistan Media back.

The #kabul_Administration says: positive cases of coronavirus at Pule-Charkhi #prison has reached to 75.even more prisoners r addicted to corona.#US must act on #Doha_agrmnt otherwis they r directly responsible for this catastrophe @US4AfghanPeace @StateDept @USAmbKabul @USFOR_A
